title: ğŸ§¹ AWS IoT Cleanup Script (Boto3)
learning_description:
This script demonstrates proper AWS IoT resource cleanup and lifecycle management.
It shows how to safely delete AWS IoT resources in the correct order, handle dependencies
between services, and avoid orphaned resources. Understanding cleanup is crucial for
cost management and maintaining a clean AWS environment. This script handles both
Vehicle-VIN-* things and AWS IoT Fleet Indexing-based Thing Groups from the aligned naming convention.
